Reviews.Title: Does not work as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Jerryman
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this camera. For one thing the variable focus is very touchy and difficult to find the sweet spot. While mounting and adjusting the camera with the dome off, the image was decent when I got where I wanted it. Once I put the dome on, the image was blurry. Verified the dome was clean, still was blurry. At night, the IR reflects off the inside of the dome and you can not see hardly anything. I returned this camera, looking for something else. All other Swann cameras I bought, 770, 760 work great.I would not recommend buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam but..
Reviews.Author: A. Schwartz "Annihilator21"
Reviews.Content: I am using an entire Swann system composed of different cams. This 781 is really nicely built high quality item but the picture quality is still a bit lacking. Might need to upgrade soon. However, for general details, this is just fine.

Reviews.Title: Didnt get what i expected
Reviews.Author: Tunde
Reviews.Content: i thought iwould be able to control the camera from my room,i thought i could vary the direction of view but i was disappointed thatw as not the casebut anyway the camera is a quality product

Reviews.Title: Not what you might think.
Reviews.Author: James Jervis
Reviews.Content: Thought it it was PTZ. It is not. It is only remote focus/aperture/time. That is all I have to say!
